attributes.action: Investigate Councils' policy of creating congestion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In Rotherham, South Yorkshire, and many other towns and cities, Councils are creating congestion black-spots, thereby adding to CO2 emissions by altering road layouts.
Such actions as removing lay-bys and narrowing roads (both at bus stops and junctions), constructing one-way systems of no useful purpose and sequencing traffic lights to cause queues & delays can be seen all over the country.
Motorists contribute over £40bn to the government and deserve better treatment.
The PM should address this deliberate policy as a matter of urgency to reduce overall costs to the economy and our CO2 emissions.
